select t.*,r3.userid tuid,r3.user_blog tuser_blog from ( select r.*, case when r2.replay_recordid =0 then r2.recordid when r2.replay_recordid is null then 0 else r2.replay_recordid end ppid from replay_info r LEFT JOIN replay_info r2 on r.replay_recordid=r2.recordid ) t left join replay_info r3 on t.replay_recordid=r3.recordid
where 1=1
and t.blogimei =#{blogimei}
order by t.create_date desc
